name: Aztecan war
description:
The game is a 2D platformer that will be based on the Aztec culture, this game will test the players abilities to manage attack from the ground and from the sky, from enemies that are from the Aztec culture, for example the enemies will involve the Ahuizotl, Dtundtuncan. 

The player character is based of the Aztec god of war, Huitzilopochtli, who will have to deal with all the mythological creature with his trusty macuahuitl
